DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , randomize , double-blind , active-controlled , parallel group , phase IV clinical trial investigate effect blood glucose evogliptin oral administration patient type 2 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Phase IV Clinical Trial Investigate Effect Blood Glucose Evogliptin Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Evogliptin 5mg Group : Administration Evogliptin 5mg 0-24 week . 2 . Liniagliptin 5mg Group : Administration linagliptin 5mg 0-12 week , Evogliptin 5mg 13-24 week
DOC.criteria: Subjects 7.0 % ≤HbA1c≤10.0 % screen Subjects untreated oral hypoglycemic agent within 8 week prior screen Subjects 20kg/m2≤BMI≤40kg/m2 screen Subjects fast plasma glucose≥270mg/dL screen Patients type 1 diabetes mellitus , secondary diabetes mellitus gestational diabetes mellitus Subjects history myocardial infarction , cerebral infarction within 24 week prior screen Subjects ALT AST 3 time high upper normal range
